{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Huge medical tank column | class = Tank1 | game = Strife | doomednum = 209 | convid = 31 }}[[Classes]]: Tank1
A column of three medical tanks filled with liquid, each containing a human body. The one on the top is still living, the one on the middle is dying, and the one on the bottom is a shriveled corpse. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Tank1 { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 192 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TNK1 A 15 TNK1 B 11 TNK1 C 40 Loop } }
